{"step_by_step_thinking": "The pulp proper, also known as dental pulp, is the part of the tooth that contains nerves and blood vessels. According to Document [24], the dental pulp contains T lymphocytes and B lymphocytes. Document [17] also mentions the presence of T lymphocytes in the dental pulp. Therefore, both T and B lymphocytes are found in the pulp proper.", "answer_choice": "C"}
